sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Selasa adalah hari yang saya pijam tidur.
english translation: "Tuesday is the day I sleep in."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak suka hari Senin karena harus kembali bekerja.
english translation: "I don't like Mondays because I have to go back to work."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari ulang tahun ku adalah tanggal 5 Januari.
english translation: "My birthday is on January 5th."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita harus membantu mereka dalam kesulitan.
english translation: "We must help them in times of difficulty."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bukannya hasil kerjanya baik, tetapi penampilannya mengecewakan.
english translation: "It's not that his work results are good, but his appearance is disappointing."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Cintailah dengan sepenuh hati, tidak pernah setengah-setengah.
english translation: "Love with all your heart, never half-heartedly."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hati-hati ketika menyebrang jalan, lalu lintas sangat sibuk di sini.
english translation: "Be careful when crossing the road, the traffic is very busy here."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan pernah lupa mengenakan helm saat mengendarai sepeda motor.
english translation: "Never forget to wear a helmet while riding a motorcycle."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya heran melihat keajaiban alam di tempat ini.
english translation: "I am astonished to see the natural wonders in this place."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jika Anda mencari hiburan malam, kota ini memiliki banyak klub.
english translation: "If you're looking for evening entertainment, this city has plenty of clubs."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan takut mengambil risiko dalam hidup.
english translation: "Don't be afraid to take risks in life."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dompet saya hilang di tempat kerja.
english translation: "I lost my wallet at work."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hindia Belanda adalah nama lama untuk negara Indonesia.
english translation: "Dutch East Indies is the old name for Indonesia."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Teh hitam manis adalah minuman favorit saya.
english translation: "Black sweet tea is my favorite drink."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Membaca adalah hobi yang sangat saya nikmati.
english translation: "Reading is a hobby that I really enjoy."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menghormati pendapat orang lain meskipun berbeda dengan saya.
english translation: "I respect the opinions of others even if they differ from mine."

sentence in indonesian using the words: HP saya jatuh dan layarnya retak.
english translation: "My mobile phone fell and its screen cracked."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Setiap orang harus tunduk pada hukum.
english translation: "Everyone must abide by the law."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ia adalah seseorang yang saya kenal sejak kecil.
english translation: "He/she is someone I've known since childhood."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ialah guru baru di sekolah ini.
english translation: "I am the new teacher at this school."
